meanings.sent1: The teacher asked us to ignore any extraneous information in the textbook.
meanings.sent2: It is important to focus on the main points and not get distracted by extraneous details.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor added an extraneous line that made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a cluttered room, filled with extraneous thoughts that clouded her judgment.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign was so extraneous that it drew attention away from the main entrance.

meanings.sent1: He decided to remove all extraneous decorations from the room to create a minimalist look.
meanings.sent2: The team focused on the essential tasks and eliminated any extraneous activities.
meanings.sent3: She found the extraneous buttons on the remote control amusing, wondering why they were there.
meanings.sent4: The extraneous noise in the background made it difficult to concentrate on the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The excess baggage was extraneous and only added unnecessary weight to the journey.

meanings.sent1: The company received an extraneous request from a client located overseas.
meanings.sent2: The unfamiliar language in the document seemed extraneous to the local employees.
meanings.sent3: The extraneous smell of spices from the neighboring restaurant wafted into her apartment.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts felt extraneous, like they belonged to someone else invading his mind.
meanings.sent5: The extraneous flavors in the dish hinted at its exotic origins.
